extendedInfo.description: If you are Bruno Mars's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Bruno Mars's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Bruno Mars's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Bruno Mars's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :) -------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics -------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - It's Better If You Don't Understand (EP) - Doo-Wops & Hooligans - Unorthodox Jukebox -------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - Again - All About You - All She Knows - Circles - Count On Me - Dance In The Mirror - Don't Give Up - Faded - Girl I Wait - Girl In The Window - Gorilla - Grenade - Grenade (Remix) - If I Knew - It Will Rain - Just The Way You Are - Just The Way You Are (Remix) - Killa On The Run - Lights - Like Tonight - Liquor Store Blues - Locked Out Of Heaven - Long Distance - Mama's Worst Nightmare - Marry You - Money Make Her Smile - Moonshine - Move On - Natalie - Never Say U Can't - Old & Crazy - Only When You're Lonely - Our First Time - Press It - Rest Of My Life - Runaway - Runaway Baby - Show Me - Somewhere In Brooklyn - Starting Today - Talking To The Moon - The Lazy Song - The Other Side - Today My Life Begins - Tonight - Top Of The World - Treasure - Turn Around - Voices In My Head - Whatching Her Move - When I Was Your Man - Who Are You - Who Is - Young Girls
